steps: There’s a big difference between juicy chicken breasts and rubbery chicken breasts. Obviously, you want to avoid the latter at all costs. Follow these 4 steps and you’re gold. You want to add protein to favorites like Caesar salad or fix up a quick chicken salad or club sandwich? Try this method and savor the results.

advantages.scalability_txt: Time effecient - find a new developer very fast. Availability - Choose from many highly educated Devolpers. One developer or even a whole team - you decide
advantages.price_ratio_txt: Save up to 70% compared to what your company would pay for a regular developer with the same qualification and experience
advantages.flexibility_txt: You are not bond to the traditional recruitment procedure. You can choose the runnig time. You get custome made solutions
advantages.transparency_txt: No hidden costs, you will pay a monthly fee for your new employee - thats it!

levels_pricing.junior_txt: BS in computer science less than one year expierence
levels_pricing.inter_txt: BS or MS in computer science 1-3 years of expierence
levels_pricing.senior_txt: BS or MS in computer science 3+ years of expierence
